item.title: Making a Website (Part 1): The Planning Stage
item.description: The blog got a bit of a makeover! Anyways, this is the first post in a series I’ve planned about building websites. It’s aimed towards the absolute beginner, but hopefully, it’ll still be interesting or useful for people with more experience.

item.title: 'why'd you make this site?', 'how did you start coding?', and other questions
item.description: my 26th birthday was earlier this month.

item.title: Commissions
item.description: COMMISSIONS status pricing terms ko-fi summer rain document.querySelector('.playpause').addEventListener('click', playpause); function playpause() { if (document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML == '') { document.querySelector('#musicsrc').play(); document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML = ''; } else { document.querySelector('#musicsrc').pause(); document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML = ''; } } #COMMISSION STATUS Commissions are currently closed but are planned to open over the summer.

item.title: Style Guide
item.description: STYLE GUIDE Based on the Poor Man’s styleguide. summer rain document.querySelector('.playpause').addEventListener('click', playpause); function playpause() { if (document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML == '') { document.querySelector('#musicsrc').play(); document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML = ''; } else { document.querySelector('#musicsrc').pause(); document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML = ''; } } #STYLE GUIDE Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Heading 1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, adipiscing elit.
